ODBC CDR driver configuration

  • See also CDR configuration files
  • cdr_odbc.c 
    ;
; cdr_odbc.conf
;

;[global]
;dsn=MySQL-test
;username=username
;password=password
;loguniqueid=yes
;dispositionstring=yes
;table=cdr		;"cdr" is default table name
;usegmtime=no             ; set to "yes" to log in GMT
    See also:
  • http://www.unixodbc.org
